title: Similar Indian Script LHF on Monkey Town book cover
content:
At first glance I thought Indian Script LHF or AZ Indian, but they don't seem to be quite right.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MonkeyTown1SM_6090.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MonkeyTown2_5693.SMjpg.jpg)
  
Recent book cover for Evolving in Monkey Town. Evans is author.  
Good \_k\_.  
Any suggestions?  
Don

Font: 

 Saloonkeeper

comments.content:
Thanks Dick. I had forgotten completely that Michael Hagemann's Font Mesa fancy font collection included scripts. Bad memory, I guess.  
Don
